alert.note: Alert for Juneau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 30 at 10:17AM CDT until further notice by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in La Crosse WI has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Black River at Black River Falls affecting Jackson County. Black River Near Galesville affecting Trempealeau and La Crosse zones. Yellow River at Necedah affecting Juneau County. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is likely. * WHERE...Yellow River at Necedah. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 13.8 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage is expected to be reached Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued this evening by 10 PM CDT.
